title: Servers Lagging?
body:
Hey,

So lately I've been experiencing ping spikes that reach upwards of 700 ping. They then decrease to 270 which is constant for the rest of the game. The ping spikes about once every minute and it's becoming a bit unbearable. I thought it was to do with being in China but I talked to some guy on the other team and he said that he's lagging in Australia too because of servers. 

Will there be any fix if theres a problem or is it just because I life in a shithole?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
